SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM1, AA.* FROM (SELECT M.m_id, M.m_photo, M.m_name, M.m_age, M.m_gender, B.b_num, B.b_category, B.b_money, B.b_start, B.b_address_road, B.b_subject, B.b_readcount, B.b_date, B.b_apply FROM MEMBER M, BOARD B WHERE M.m_id = B.m_id AND B.b_type = 'A' AND M.m_type = 'C' AND M.m_status = 'N' AND B.b_delete = 'N' AND B.m_id = #{m_id} ORDER BY B.b_date DESC) AA ) A
WHERE RNUM1 >= #{startNo}+1 AND RNUM1 <= #{startNo}+5
